description:
With the Sports Festival coming up, Mishima and Honda`s classmates have high expecetations for them as members of athletic clubs. Honda is made to participate in multiple events by his class. Mami is disgusted by Honda`s attitude, but when Honda says something, she ends up signing up for the three-legged race as a co-ed pair with him. The unathletic Mami isn`t happy about it, but Honda begins training with her for her sake.
As the school continues to gear up for the sports festival, Miharu looks on with a sad expression...
Source: crunchyroll
